articles.title: The 'Black & Missing' Docuseries Is A Wake-Up Call For America - HuffPost
articles.description: The HBO documentary directed by Soledad O'Brien and Geeta Gandbhir follows Derrica and Natalie Wilson, who are reuniting families and advocating for missing Black people.
articles.content: "Were motivated to help these families that have no other avenues, nowhere else to turn," said Natalie Wilson. "Theyre not getting the resources from law enforcement, and the media isnt covering thei… [+16595 chars]

articles.title: Jersey trailer: Shahid Kapoor impresses as a father who struggles to live up to his son’s expectations - The Indian Express
articles.description: While Shahid Kapoor has somehow managed to age backwards and look like a college-goer in the flashback scenes, he is yet to come out from the Kabir Singh mode while enacting aggression and pain.
